text: Henry Campbell Liken McCullough (21 July 1943 â€“ 14 June 2016) was a Northern Irish guitarist, vocalist and songwriter. He was best known for his work as a member of Spooky Tooth, Paul McCartney & Wings, The Grease Band and Sweeney's Men. He also performed and recorded as a solo artist and session musician. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Musicians from Northern Ireland Category:British singer-songwriters
title: Henry McCullough
